name: Lemony Zucchini Salad
author: Alison Sprinkman
summary: Refreshing and simple zucchini salad. Pairs well with everything from seafood to BBQ.
ingredients: ½ small sweet onion (such as Vidalia®), thinly sliced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place zucchini slices in a colander for 10 minutes, allowing juices to release; pat dry
Combine zucchini, onion, and parsley together in a bowl
Mix lemon zest, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, and sugar together in a separate bowl; season with salt and pepper
Slowly stream olive oil into lemon juice mixture while whisking constantly until dressing emulsifies
Pour dressing over zucchini mixture; toss to coat
